name: Ella Chen
summary: Data analyst with 4 years of experience in the education sector. Skilled in leveraging Power BI to drive data-informed decisions and improve operational efficiency.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led the development of automated dashboards in Power BI, resulting in a 20% increase in student engagement. Implemented predictive analytics models to optimize course offerings.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Analyzed student performance data to identify at-risk students, leading to a 15% improvement in student retention rates. Developed data visualization reports for management decision-making.

projects.name: Student Success Predictor
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict student success factors, increasing course completion rates by 18%. Utilized Python, Power BI, and SQL.

projects.name: Operational Efficiency Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive dashboard to track resource allocation and optimize operational workflows, resulting in a 25% reduction in operational costs. Tools used: Power BI, Excel.
